divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the sky at around 10, when I saw this object. First, I was thinking about a plane (I saw a lot around there, because of Logan Intl Airport & Hanscom AFB) , or something like that, but there was no sound, and the light weren't flashing. So I took a picture. When I look at the pictures on the computer, I remarked that I didn't saw anything like that before. I thank about a B-2 Spirit or a F-117.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Watertown
There were no other sightings in Watertown on or around July 12th 2012
Summary: I saw a triangle on the sky
